Newark.Benson Street station:
Benson Street is former train station in a residential section of the town of Glen Ridge, New Jersey.
The station was constructed in 1883 in a unique English Tudor design with stucco facades and a slate roof as part of the New York and Greenwood Lake Railway, a Erie Railroad operation, and was known as Glenwood. It had a two platform, two track station with the gas lights on the side of tracks.
